0.code:
male(asad).

female(shazia).

parent(shazia, asad).

mother(X, Y) :- parent(X, Y), female(X).

%? mother(Mom, asad).

1.code:
% Adding parents to the existing family
parent(mary, john).
parent(mary, james).
parent(henry, john).
parent(henry, james).

% Queries
%? parent(mary, Who).
%? parent(henry, Who).

2.code:
% New family members to introduce cousins
male(tom).
parent(elizabeth, tom).
parent(michael, tom).

% Defining cousin relationship based on the parents
cousin(X, Y) :- parent(A, X), parent(B, Y), A \= B, brother(A, B).

% Queries
%? cousin(tom, Who).
%? cousin(john, Who).
